name: Glaz

biography.description: Glaz is a back-line marksman, capable of soft breaching and providing covering fire from a distance.

gameplayTips: Use the HDS Flipsight to highlight enemies in yellow for better visibility.
Take advantage of Glaz's ability to see through smoke to provide covering fire.
Use the high velocity of the OTS-03 to penetrate soft walls and Castle barricades.
